name: Marohi Erqi
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Pulverise
flavourText: Lumbering as a sea lion, clumsy as a berry-drunk pigeon. That was Erqi.
It mattered little. When Erqi's maul fell true, so did its target.

name: Allelopathy
flavourText: "Nothing is more natural than competition.
One feasts, another starves.
One blossoms, another withers.
And one cannot catch the golden sunlight
without casting a bitter shadow."
- Cadiro Perandus

name: Ascent From Flesh
explicitMods: You have Phasing if Energy Shield Recharge has started Recently
flavourText: A single step forward
Snap free from the prison
Reborn into freedom eternal

name: Ashcaller
explicitMods: 10% chance to Trigger Level 10 Summon Raging Spirit on Kill
Adds 5 to 9 Fire Damage to Spells
flavourText: "We do not command fire.
Ngamahu lends it, and Hinekora returns it."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

name: Ashrend
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Added Fire Damage
13% increased Physical Damage with Ranged Weapons
-7 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
flavourText: The blasted oak stands forever.

name: Slavedriver's Hand
explicitMods: Skills used by Traps have 18% increased Area of Effect
Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also Apply to Trap Throwing Speed

10% chance to gain an Endurance, Frenzy or Power Charge when any
of your Traps are Triggered by an Enemy
Skills which throw Traps Cost Life instead of Mana
flavourText: A plan without a deadline stays a plan.

name: Abhorrent Interrogation
explicitMods: 22% chance to inflict Withered for 2 seconds on Hit

Enemies take 4% increased Elemental Damage from your Hits for
each Withered you have inflicted on them
Your Hits cannot Penetrate or ignore Elemental Resistances
flavourText: "We have methods of interrogation the Inquisitors only dream of."
- Marcus, Brotherhood Liaison

name: Quickening Covenant
explicitMods: Minions have +23% chance to Suppress Spell Damage

Notable Passive Skills in Radius are Transformed to
instead grant: Minions have 25% reduced Movement Speed
descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Lose that which you never had. Gain power you could not have grasped.

name: Tecrod's Gaze
explicitMods:
20% increased Main Hand Critical Strike Chance per
Murderous Eye Jewel affecting you, up to a maximum of 200%

+10% to Off Hand Critical Strike Multiplier per
Murderous Eye Jewel affecting you, up to a maximum of +100%
descrText: Place into an Abyssal Socket on an Item or into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The Hated Slave seeks dominion over his own kind.

name: Asphyxia's Wrath
explicitMods: Gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
Hexes Transfer to all Enemies in a range of 30 when Hexed Enemy dies
flavourText: Mist of breath
Icing to lips and throat
As the warm ones choke and fall
Upon the frozen wasteland.

name: Astramentis
explicitMods: -4 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
flavourText: Mindless rage will shake the world,
Cunning lies will bend it.
Reckless haste will break the world,
And into darkness send it.

name: Atziri's Mirror
explicitMods: 50% reduced Duration of Curses on you
+10% Chance to Block Attack Damage while not Cursed
+20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while Cursed
flavourText: "As long as I see death in my mirror, so will Wraeclast."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

name: Atziri's Splendour
flavourText: "When you have nothing to hide,
you have nothing to fear."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

name: Atziri's Step
flavourText: "Those who dance are considered insane
by those who cannot hear the music."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

name: Badge of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: Your Maximum Frenzy Charges is equal to your Maximum Power Charges
10% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate of Travel Skills per Frenzy Charge
10% increased Effect of Elusive on you per Power Charge
23% chance to lose a Frenzy Charge when you use a Travel Skill
22% chance to lose a Power Charge when you gain Elusive
flavourText: Greater than any blade, agility and intellect will be your weapons.

name: Berek's Respite
explicitMods: Adds 25 to 30 Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
When you Kill a Shocked Enemy, inflict an equivalent Shock on each nearby Enemy
When you Kill an Ignited Enemy, inflict an equivalent Ignite on each nearby Enemy
flavourText: "With Flame licking at his heels
Berek berated the clouds
Until vengeful Storm spewed forth his rains
And Berek held on tight
As Fire screamed and steamed
And fled."
- Berek and the Untamed

name: Voidheart
implicitMods: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
explicitMods: Adds 1 to 3 Chaos Damage to Attacks
10% chance to Cause Monsters to Flee
Melee Attacks have 49% chance to cause Bleeding
Melee Attacks have 23% chance to Poison on Hit
flavourText: Nothing spreads fear faster than the unknown.

name: Bloodbond
explicitMods: Minions have +8% chance to Suppress Spell Damage
flavourText: What mother wouldn't give her life for that of her children?

name: Bramblejack
explicitMods: Adds 2 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
-2 Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
40% of Melee Physical Damage taken reflected to Attacker
flavourText: It is safer to be feared than to be loved.

name: Breath of the Council
explicitMods: Chaos Skills have 40% increased Skill Effect Duration
flavourText: Breathe deep, and give yourself over to eternity.

name: Breathstealer
explicitMods: Create a Blighted Spore when your Skills or Minions Kill a Rare Monster
flavourText: The last gasp is not always one's final act.
<default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

name: Brutal Restraint
explicitMods:
Denoted service of 3005 dekhara in the akhara of Asenath
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Maraketh
descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: They believed themselves the most ordered, but that tradition turned their forests to salt.

name: Bubonic Trail
explicitMods: Triggers Level 20 Death Walk when Equipped
10% increased Damage for each type of Abyss Jewel affecting you
flavourText: Even the dead serve the Lightless.

name: Carnage Heart
explicitMods: 1.49% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
flavourText: Forged from the blood of countless wars,
its thirst has only begun.

name: Cinderswallow Urn
explicitMods: Recharges 5 Charges when you Consume an Ignited corpse
Regenerate 3% of Life per second during Effect
Enemies Ignited by you during Effect take 10% increased Damage
Recover 3% of Energy Shield when you Kill an Enemy during Effect
descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A controlled burn is sometimes necessary for new life.

name: Clayshaper
explicitMods: Grants Level 12 Summon Stone Golem Skill
+1 to maximum number of Summoned Golems
Minions deal 5 to 12 additional Attack Physical Damage
flavourText: There is nothing, flesh, spirit, or stone
Free from our hunger for dominion.

name: Combat Focus
explicitMods: With 40 total Intelligence and Dexterity in Radius, Prismatic Skills deal 50% less Fire Damage
With 40 total Intelligence and Dexterity in Radius, Prismatic Skills cannot choose Fire
descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Voll stood at the gates of Sarn, and a nation stood behind him.
He thought of the righteousness of his cause,
and of the glory he would bring to the empire he would soon lead.
But as Chitus and his gemlings advanced, he thought only of the fight.

name: Crown of the Pale King
explicitMods: 0.62% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Reflects 100 to 150 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers
30% of Damage you Reflect to Enemies when Hit is leeched as Life
flavourText: A lightless world
a silent reign
two sightless eyes
feed on your pain.

name: Death Rush
explicitMods: 0.65% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
You gain Onslaught for 4 seconds on Kill
flavourText: To truly appreciate life you must be there when it ends

name: Tremor Rod
implicitMods: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 10 Blastchain Mine
Mines can be Detonated an additional time
flavourText: The best way to gain the element of surprise,
is to let your enemy learn your plans,
and execute them - twice.

name: Combat Focus
explicitMods: With 40 total Dexterity and Strength in Radius, Prismatic Skills deal 50% less Lightning Damage
With 40 total Dexterity and Strength in Radius, Prismatic Skills cannot choose Lightning
descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Standing behind iron bars,
Daresso thought of his adoring fans cheering his name,
his wife's warm embrace waiting for him,
and of the celebrations that would soon be thrown in his name.
But when the arena gate lifted, he thought only of the fight.
